title: Govt to add up to 60 GW coal-based capacity in addition to 27 GW under construction: R K Singh
description: According to the projections of National Electricity Plan for 2022-32, the required coal- and lignite-based installed capacity will be 283 GW by 2031-2032 as against the present installed capacity of 214 GW, the power ministry said in a statement on Wednesday.
